sentences.cn: 一名英国出生的科学家

sentences.en: Breakfast television arrived in British life precisely a decade ago.
sentences.cn: 准确地说，早间电视节目于10年前进入英国人的生活。

sentences.en: British forces in the Caribbean were being decimated by disease.
sentences.cn: 加勒比海地区的英国部队有大批的人病死。

sentences.en: He was jailed for five years as an alleged British spy.
sentences.cn: 他被指控为英国间谍，入狱关押了5年。

sentences.en: In June 1942, the British 8th Army was in full retreat.
John Major has reached the pinnacle of British politics.
sentences.cn: 约翰·梅杰已攀上了英国政界的顶峰。

sentences.en: Many of the revellers are tourists and British day-trippers.
sentences.cn: 很多饮酒狂欢的人都是观光客和来一日游的英国旅客。

sentences.en: Mr Olaechea has British residency by virtue of his marriage.
sentences.cn: 奥拉伊奇先生通过结婚而取得在英国的永久居留权。

sentences.en: Of course, the British will suffer such daily stresses patiently.
sentences.cn: 当然，英国人将会耐心地承受这些日常压力。

sentences.en: The British media is in the hands of clubby men.
sentences.cn: 英国媒体掌握在一群排外的人手中。

sentences.en: The first British attempt to colonize Ireland was in the twelfth century.
sentences.cn: 英国最早尝试在爱尔兰开拓殖民地是在12世纪。

sentences.en: The small British crowd roared themselves hoarse, waving their Union Jacks.
sentences.cn: 一小群英国人挥舞着国旗，吼得嗓子都沙哑了。

sentences.en: They insist on tastier chocolate than the anaemic British stuff.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持要比淡而无味的英国货味道更好的巧克力。

sentences.en: They still get treated differently from almost every other contemporary British band.
sentences.cn: 他们所得到的待遇仍然与当代几乎所有其他英国乐队都不同。

sentences.en: This is a European, and not a specifically British, problem.
sentences.cn: 这是全欧洲面临的问题，而不是英国独有的问题。

sentences.en: We definitely wanted to salvage some pride for British tennis.
sentences.cn: 我们当然想为英国网球挽回一些尊严。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 不列颠哥伦比亚（省名，位于加拿大西部）
英国英语（英国说和写的英语，尤以之与美国英语相区别）
英属印度（原为印度的一部分，后分属印度和巴基斯坦）
英属北美；英国保险公会北美洲保险区域
英属维尔京群岛（英国在小安的列斯群岛最北部的殖民地，首府罗德城）

trans.tran_cn: 不列颠的，英国的，英国人的，英国英语的
trans.tran_en: relating to Britain or its people
